celestial_enchantments.tooltip.alt: Press [%s] to show enchantment effect formula
celestial_enchantments.tooltip.head: [Helmet]
celestial_enchantments.tooltip.table_des: Applies Celestial Enchantments to your tools. Consumes Celestial Catalysts.
Enchanted books in Chiseled Bookshelves provide black list for enchanting, but decrease enchantment levels.
Chaotic Pendant and tools with high enchantment affinity will make rare enchantments more common, and reduce chance to produce curse enchantments
enchantment.celestial_enchantments.abyss: Reduce abyssal damage by %s, but increase other damage by %s
enchantment.celestial_enchantments.arrow: After hitting target, drag all entities within a radius of %s grid with the target as the center to the target
Dealing %s of original damage as magical damage to enemies around the target upon hit
enchantment.celestial_enchantments.born_: Recover %2$s durability every %3$s seconds in places where brightness level is less than %1$s
enchantment.celestial_enchantments.celes: When damaged, a single attack can only deal up to %s of the wearer's maximum health
enchantment.celestial_enchantments.clust: For every entity of the same type around the user, increase damage by %s
enchantment.celestial_enchantments.const: After blocking %s damage, next blocking will reflect %s damage as magic damage
enchantment.celestial_enchantments.corru: +%s Exp pickup, but when you picks up exp, there is a %s chance to gain harmful effects
enchantment.celestial_enchantments.cures: When equipped, lose %s durability every %s seconds until it has less than half durability
enchantment.celestial_enchantments.death: Increase damage by %s of the target's maximum health
Upon death, deals %s magic damage to surrounding creatures within %s blocks
When nearby players within %s blocks die with [%s], there is a %s chance to gain %s, %s, %s, and %s. Otherwise, you will die together
enchantment.celestial_enchantments.destr: After being attacked, deals %s of received damage to surrounding targets within %s blocks
Target will not be able to have invulnerable frames for %s seconds
Increase explosion damage received by %s, and increase other incoming damage by %s
enchantment.celestial_enchantments.dimen: When you switch dimensions, gain %s, %s, and %s
enchantment.celestial_enchantments.divin: The further the target is from the attacker, the higher damage output is
enchantment.celestial_enchantments.echo_: When receiving a deadly attack, block the damage and restore %s of maximum health. Cooldown: %s seconds
enchantment.celestial_enchantments.explo: %s chance explode when hitting target, but does not break blocks
The thrown trident has a %s chance to explode
enchantment.celestial_enchantments.eyes_: Gain %2$s in places where brightness is less than %1$s
enchantment.celestial_enchantments.fierc: Melee damage against the same target is increased by %s
enchantment.celestial_enchantments.firep: Gain immunity to hot floor damage and reduce fire damage taken by %s
enchantment.celestial_enchantments.flame: Burn attacker for %s seconds when attacked
enchantment.celestial_enchantments.frost: Deals %s damage to the attacker when hurt, and inflict %s
enchantment.celestial_enchantments.gift_: When struck by lightning, recover %s of lost life, then gain %s and %s
enchantment.celestial_enchantments.hand_: When you kill a target, it will drop all its equipment
enchantment.celestial_enchantments.have_: After waking up from bed, obtain %s and %s
enchantment.celestial_enchantments.holy_: When you are attacked while sneaking, gain %s
enchantment.celestial_enchantments.knigh: While mounting something, increase damage by %s
enchantment.celestial_enchantments.life_: When healed, gain absorption equal to %s of amount healed, up to %s of max health
enchantment.celestial_enchantments.light: Increase %s damage to targets with less than %s armor points
After arrow hits a target, %s chance to strike the target with lightning
enchantment.celestial_enchantments.magic: When you hit a target, deal additional magic damage equal to %s of the original damage
enchantment.celestial_enchantments.misfo: If the target is under %s, increase damage by %s
enchantment.celestial_enchantments.origi: When healed, there is a %s chance to gain %s or %s
enchantment.celestial_enchantments.parti: Upon death, surrounding players within %s blocks heal %s of their max health
enchantment.celestial_enchantments.photo: In places where brightness level is above %s, gain +%s mining speed
Recover %2$s durability every %3$s seconds in places where brightness level is greater than %1$s
enchantment.celestial_enchantments.potio: The duration of an obtained potion effect will be increased by %s
enchantment.celestial_enchantments.pure_: Continuously clears potion effects from you
enchantment.celestial_enchantments.quenc: When attacking a burning target, extinguish the target's flame and increase damage by %s for every remaining seconds of fire, up to %s
enchantment.celestial_enchantments.quick: While sprinting, increase damage by %s and knock back the target
enchantment.celestial_enchantments.react: After blocking an attack, knock back attacker with strength of %s
enchantment.celestial_enchantments.reven: Damage to targets that recently attacked the user is increased by %s
enchantment.celestial_enchantments.scorc: Using a shield to block an attack will cause the attacker to burn for %s seconds
enchantment.celestial_enchantments.shado: When attacking in places with brightness less than %s, deal an additional %s point of abyss damage to the target
enchantment.celestial_enchantments.solid: When the wearer's health is less than half, the damage received is reduced by %s
enchantment.celestial_enchantments.suppr: Target will not be able to heal for %s seconds
enchantment.celestial_enchantments.the_s: When attacked, there is a %s chance that attacker will be targeted by surrounding mobs within %s blocks
enchantment.celestial_enchantments.traum: Restore %s of lost health when attacked
enchantment.celestial_enchantments.vampi: On attack, heals %s of the damage dealt
enchantment.celestial_enchantments.void_: When you hit a target, deal %s of the damage as abyss damage to surrounding monsters
enchantment.celestial_enchantments.words: Increase damage by %s for every exp level, up to %s
